step1.para: Place the larger low range synchronizer on a bench and install the sliding clutch on blocker pins, recessed side up ( Figure 271).

figure.caption: Figure 270. Install Sliding Clutch on Blocker Pins

step1.para: Install the three springs in the bores of the high range synchronizer ring ( Figure 272).

figure.caption: Figure 271. Install Springs in Bores of High Range Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Place the high range synchronizer ring over the blocker pins of the low range synchronizer, seating springs against the pins ( Figure 273).

figure.caption: Figure 272. Place High Range Synchronizer Ring Over Blocker Pins of Low Range Synchronizer

step1.para: Apply downward pressure to the high range synchronizer ring WHILE TWISTING COUNTERCLOCKWISE to compress the springs and fully seat the ring on the blocker pins of the low range synchronizer ( Figure 274).

figure.caption: Figure 273. Apply Downward Pressure to High Range Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Install synchronizer assembly on the splines of the output shaft, low range ring in recess of the low range gear ( Figure 275).

figure.caption: Figure 274. Install Synchronizer Assembly on Splines of Output Shaft
